News.headline: Club News: Scott Doe Suspension Update
News.page_title: Club News: Scott Doe Suspension Update
News.URL_keywords: Club News: Scott Doe Suspension Update
News.short_description: Following Scott Doeâ€™s sending off during our match v Torquay on Tuesday evening the club lodged an appeal against the decision with the Football Association.
News.description: Unfortunately at a meeting of the FA Regulatory Commission held this afternoon our appeal was unsuccessful and Scott will now serve a one match suspension with immediate effect meaning he will not be available for our National League fixture v Eastleigh on Saturday.
